thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com | 3 of 165
thread.title: Casey

author: Casey
title: Casey
text: Originally I placed the incorrect order. I emailed them and they were happy to correct it. Because my order had been packaged, the company did not charge me for the second shipping fee. I received the order within a few days. I haven't worn the wigs yet but the texture feels course and looks like my 4c hair when my twists out are about 5 days old. I ordered two...black and the one with gold.
